thread.title: Colorado State football sees its new on-campus stadium becoming tangible reality
thread.title_full: Colorado State football sees its new on-campus stadium becoming tangible reality

author: Mike Brohard, The Reporter-Herald
title: Colorado State football sees its new on-campus stadium becoming tangible reality
text:
Colorado State football sees its new on-campus stadium becoming tangible reality The Rams’ new practice fields will be on the west side of the stadium Share this: Click to share on Tumblr (Opens in new window) Mike Brohard, Loveland Reporter-Herald Colorado State football coach Mike Bobo snaps a photo of the new on-campus stadium with his phone. Bobo says he finds something new that amazes him each time he visits. March 20, 2017 at 8:32 pm | UPDATED: Dobbs: A lesson for Trump on choosing the right battles 
FORT COLLINS — Colorado State athletic director Joe Parker looks at home in his hard hat, and his ability to navigate through the construction of the on-campus stadium is well practiced, as are his descriptions of the different rooms and areas inside the facility. 
“There’s always something different to see,” Parker said during a tour of the facility with media Monday. “You can visualize it, but when it’s right in front of you, it’s pretty special.” Related Articles March 8, 2017 CSU’s Hayden Hunt, a NFL hopeful, on why punters are like snipers, hate for CU, more in Q&A 
The project is still on time and on budget, according to Parker, with the football team planning on moving into the west side of the stadium in mid June. In the beginning of August, the academic and alumni aspects will be settling in on the east. 
In the coming months, the field surface will be put in place, donor bricks will be laid outside the stadium and the LED scoreboard will be installed. 
The Rams’ new practice fields will be on the west side of the stadium, meaning the large and upgraded locker room will serve the team every day of the week, not just on fall Saturdays. With the exception of the Anderson Academic Center, each aspect of the team’s needs will be taken care of in one centralized location.
